segments.text: I observe the woman at the sink, meticulously drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is intense, almost meditative.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the water overflowing, creating a mess on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's disgusting to see the water spreading everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children behind her are being sneaky, trying to get cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on a stool, which looks very unsafe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit annoyed that the woman isn't paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She should be supervising the kids, not just drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting for her share, looking expectant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think this scene is a recipe for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to intervene before something bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR
